entity.name: Latest updates from local US authorities regarding the coronavirus
Reflecting on the global impact of George Floyd on the one-year anniversary of his death
entity.description: On May 25, 2020, 46-year-old Black man George Floyd was murdered in Minneapolis by former police officer Derek Chauvin. Video of Floyd's death spread quickly, igniting protests in cities across the US and around the world in a fight against systemic racism. On the one-year anniversary of Floyd's death, people reflect on the trial, a year of protest and the push for a more just and equal society.

entity.name: Protests in the US
entity.description: US cities rocked by unrest following the death of George Floyd as he was detained by police.

text:
Minnesotans, if you recently attended a demonstration, vigil, or community cleanup, thank you for using your voice for change. 

Keep looking out for your communities and get a test to avoid spreading #COVID19. Find a clinic near you. #StaySafeMN 

https://t.co/2IxmaUtNsO
